languages.text: {n}С шипением запись сменяется новой — теперь это голос стража Летуса:{/n} "Итак, замысел Теодоры свершился — десятина Коронуса отныне принадлежит династии. Совпали ли ее замыслы с твоими, отпрыск, мне не ведомо. Впрочем, это уже не важно".

{n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."
languages.original_text: {n}С шипением запись сменяется новой — теперь это голос стража Летуса:{/n} "Итак, замысел Теодоры свершился — десятина Коронуса отныне принадлежит династии. Совпали ли ее замыслы с твоими, отпрыск, мне не ведомо. Впрочем, это уже не важно".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus.{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan has come to fruition. The Koronus tithe belongs to the dynasty now. Whether her plans align with yours, offspring, I know not. Nor, in any case, does it matter at this point."

{n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus.{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan has come to fruition. The Koronus tithe belongs to the dynasty now. Whether her plans align with yours, offspring, I know not. Nor, in any case, does it matter at this point."

{n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan has come to fruition. The Koronus Expanse tithe belongs to the dynasty now. Whether her plans would have aligned with yours, scion, I do not know. However, that no longer matters at this point."

{n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan has come to fruition. The Koronus Expanse tithe belongs to the dynasty now. Whether her plans would have aligned with yours, scion, I do not know. However, that no longer matters at this point."

{n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

{n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

languages.text: {n}Mit einem zischenden Geräusch wird eine weitere Aufzeichnung abgespielt. Dieses Mal ertönt die Stimme des Beobachters von Leethus:{/n} "Und damit geht Theodoras Plan auf: Der Zehnt der Koronus-Ausdehnung gehört jetzt der Dynastie. Ob sie dieselben Absichten hatte wie Ihr, Sprössling, weiß ich nicht, aber das spielt auch keine Rolle."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem zischenden Geräusch wird eine weitere Aufzeichnung abgespielt. Dieses Mal ertönt die Stimme des Beobachters von Leethus:{/n} "Und damit geht Theodoras Plan auf: Der Zehnt der Koronus-Ausdehnung gehört jetzt der Dynastie. Ob sie dieselben Absichten hatte wie Ihr, Sprössling, weiß ich nicht, aber das spielt auch keine Rolle."

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement se fait entendre, puis une nouvelle voix commence à parler. Cette fois, il s'agit d'un enregistrement du gardien de Leethus :{/n} « Ainsi, le plan de Théodora est accompli : la dîme des Étendues de Koronus appartient maintenant à la dynastie. J'ignore si elle avait les mêmes intentions que vous, rejeton, mais cela n'a guère d'importance. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement se fait entendre, puis une nouvelle voix commence à parler. Cette fois, il s'agit d'un enregistrement du gardien de Leethus :{/n} « Ainsi, le plan de Théodora est accompli : la dîme des Étendues de Koronus appartient maintenant à la dynastie. J'ignore si elle avait les mêmes intentions que vous, rejeton, mais cela n'a guère d'importance. »

languages.text: {n}伴随着“嘶嘶”的声音，新的录音片段开始播放，这次是利瑟斯的守望者说出的话。{/n}“既然如此，西奥多拉的计划便顺利完成。如今，科罗努斯扩区的什一税属于这个王朝。我不知道你和她是否怀着同样的意图，孩子，但这并不重要。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

traits.locale_text: {n}伴随着“嘶嘶”的声音，新的录音片段开始播放，这次是利瑟斯的守望者说出的话。{/n}“既然如此，西奥多拉的计划便顺利完成。如今，科罗努斯扩区的什一税属于这个王朝。我不知道你和她是否怀着同样的意图，孩子，但这并不重要。”

languages.text: {n}Con un siseo, empieza a reproducirse una nueva grabación. Esta vez, la voz es la del vigilante de Leethus:{/n} «Y así, se cumple el plan de Theodora: el diezmo de la Extensión de Koronus ahora pertenece a la dinastía. Desconozco si sus intenciones eran las mismas que las tuyas, descendiente, pero eso poco importa».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un siseo, empieza a reproducirse una nueva grabación. Esta vez, la voz es la del vigilante de Leethus:{/n} «Y así, se cumple el plan de Theodora: el diezmo de la Extensión de Koronus ahora pertenece a la dinastía. Desconozco si sus intenciones eran las mismas que las tuyas, descendiente, pero eso poco importa».

languages.text: {n}シューッという音とともに、新たな録音が再生され始めた。今度の声は、リーザスの監視者のものだ。{/n}「こうして、シオドーラ様の計画は成功しました。コロヌス・エクスパンスの租税は今や王朝のものとなったのです。彼女の意図が子孫のあなたと同じであったかどうかは分かりませんが、それは大した問題ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

traits.locale_text: {n}シューッという音とともに、新たな録音が再生され始めた。今度の声は、リーザスの監視者のものだ。{/n}「こうして、シオドーラ様の計画は成功しました。コロヌス・エクスパンスの租税は今や王朝のものとなったのです。彼女の意図が子孫のあなたと同じであったかどうかは分かりませんが、それは大した問題ではありません」

languages.text: {n}Yeni bir kayıt çalmaya başlarken bir tıslama sesi duyuluyor. Bu kez ses, Leethus Gözcüsü'nden çıkıyor.{/n} "Böylelikle Theodora'nın planı gerçekleşmiş oldu. Koronus Enginliği'nin aşarı artık hanedanlığın. Niyetlerin örtüşüp örtüşmediğini bilemem zürriyet ama bunun pek bir önemi yok zaten."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a hissing sound as a new recording starts playing. This time, the voice is that of the watcher of Leethus:{/n} "And so, Theodora's plan is accomplished: the tithe of the Koronus Expanse now belongs to the dynasty. Whether her intentions were the same as yours, offspring, I know not, but that matters little."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeni bir kayıt çalmaya başlarken bir tıslama sesi duyuluyor. Bu kez ses, Leethus Gözcüsü'nden çıkıyor.{/n} "Böylelikle Theodora'nın planı gerçekleşmiş oldu. Koronus Enginliği'nin aşarı artık hanedanlığın. Niyetlerin örtüşüp örtüşmediğini bilemem zürriyet ama bunun pek bir önemi yok zaten."
